name: Cube-Ventures
description:
Cube-Ventures is a timed 3D video game. Your goal as the player is to collect all the cubes in the arena as fast as you can. In level 1 the cubes are in order, but ever other level the cubes span randomly. Have Fun!

YouTube Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zx0J7r8pGWw
